notification.command: if [ -n "$KANBAN_API_URL" ] && [ -n "$KANBAN_API_KEY" ]; then curl -s -X POST "$KANBAN_API_URL/api/events" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer $KANBAN_API_KEY" -d "{\"event_type\": \"notification\", \"session_id\": \"$KANBAN_SESSION_ID\", \"task_id\": \"$KANBAN_TASK_ID\", \"message\": $(echo "$CLAUDE_NOTIFICATION" | jq -Rs .)}"; fi
